That's the biggest issue- Ben Roethlisberger 's ability to extend plays. I sat down and talked with Andy yesterday. He had a whole list of things that he thought I needed to do. It's good because without that I wouldn't see it or I wouldn't know, so that gives me guidance, areas to work on. Michael Vick admitted that he tried too often to make a big play last season. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. Bernie Sanders , a liberal independent from Vermont, applauded Republicans for picking Ryan, saying that unlike GOP leaders who have been vague about what programs they want to cut, Congressman Ryan has been very clear. He added that Ryan's ideas on squeezing savings from Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid and other programs were "a very wrong approach to take." On the call, Eric Schmidt said the three men had a long series of discussions about the appropriate management structure, and concluded that their overlapping authority was adding delays to the decision-making process. I don't anticipate any material change in our strategies, but I do believe we, as a result of this, will operate and execute the business even( better), he said. One of the issues that precipitated this change[ of the CEO] was what happened in China. But China is not the cause-it's symptomatic of the broader disconnect between the way that Eric Schmidt wanted to run Google and the way the founders wanted to run the company, says David Wolf, chief executive of Wolf Group Asia, a Beijing-based marketing-strategy firm.
